items.badge_description: Traveling the world is hard, but not for you. It's as easy as cracking open a new brew! You have had a beer from at least 15 different regions around the world. Try 5 more for Level 4!

items.badge_description: Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 20 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 5!
Traveling the world is hard, but not for you. It's as easy as cracking open a new brew! You have had a beer from at least 10 different regions around the world. Try 5 more for Level 3!

You may not be able to see through the haze, but that juicy, hoppy goodness goes down smooth. What started as a trend is here to stay. That's 15 different beers with the style of IPA - New England / Hazy, Pale Ale - New England / Hazy, IPA - Milkshake, or Pale Ale - Milkshake. Try 5 more for Level 4!

Kiwis, rugby and sheep aren’t the only things New Zealand has to offer. There’s a ton of great beers in a variety of styles just waiting for you to explore! That's 25 different beers from a brewery in New Zealand. Try 5 more for Level 6.

beer.beer_description: Packed full of tropical and citrus flavours, with just a hint of bitterness to round this juicy brew off. A consistent, solid Hazy IPA.

items.badge_description:
The beer style with the most annual check-ins definitely deserves its own party, don’t you think?

In 2023, Sierra Nevada had the brilliant idea to create a day of celebration for hazies, and we gotta tip our cap to their brilliant idea! 

This year, we’re excited to introduce our second iteration of the Hazy IPA Day badge.

You may not be able to see through the haze, but that juicy, hoppy goodness goes down smooth. What started as a trend is here to stay. That's 345 different beers with the style of IPA - New England / Hazy, Pale Ale - New England / Hazy, IPA - Milkshake, or Pale Ale - Milkshake. Try 5 more for Level 70!

beer.beer_description: Packed full of tropical and citrus flavours, with just a hint of bitterness to round this juicy brew off. A consistent, solid Hazy IPA.

items.badge_description: Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 5 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 2! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

You may not be able to see through the haze, but that juicy, hoppy goodness goes down smooth. What started as a trend is here to stay. That's 5 different beers with the style of IPA - New England / Hazy, Pale Ale - New England / Hazy, IPA - Milkshake, or Pale Ale - Milkshake. Try 5 more for Level 2!

Kiwis, rugby and sheep aren’t the only things New Zealand has to offer. There’s a ton of great beers in a variety of styles just waiting for you to explore! That's 10 different beers from a brewery in New Zealand. Try 5 more for Level 3.

beer.beer_description: Packed full of tropical and citrus flavours, with just a hint of bitterness to round this juicy brew off. A consistent, solid Hazy IPA.
